articles.author: ESPN staff
articles.title: Sports world reacts to Coco Gauff's French Open title - ESPN
articles.description: Coco Gauff won her second major trophy, defeating Aryna Sabalenka in the French Open final, and social media reacted accordingly.
articles.content:
Coco Gauff is a champion once again.
Gauff, 21, won her first French Open title by defeating top-ranked Aryna Sabalenka 6-7 (5), 6-2, 6-4 in Saturday's final.
